price: 2. Wonna hinnay koroosite mari cakkik kaxxa-mariinitaanam kee Yallaa kee Nabii cinat yanin.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
